title: I CANT LOGIN
body:
I was playing last night and everything was good. Password was right. Log in this morning have not changed password, no notifications about it at all. M I know that my brother tried to login into it and spammed it with wrong passwords. The forgot password option inst working either. I also tried to change password and it says that my password is wrong. Someone help me PLEASE.

NEVER MIND IT HAS ALL BEEN SORTED

replies.body: Glad you got your issue resolved :) If you have any other queries let us know!
